summary: A mod that brings 2 new weapons, 2 cloth pieces and cannibalism.
descriptionHtml:
This is.. by far.. the dumbest.. quite possibly.. coolest.. mod I have ever made. I bring to you "Nord, it's what's for DINNER!".

GAMESPOT! I'm ready for my spotlight!

CHECK OUT MY OTHER MODS ON STEAM WORKSHOP!
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Owlburgers/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]Owlburgers's Workshop[/url]

[img=http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/607/9f01.png][/img]

What this mod brings:

Two new weapons: Cannibal Fork and Cannibal Knife, smithable at any forge. They are dwarven level weapons that can be smithed without needing dwarven smithing. However, to fully temper them you'll need dwarven smithing (they are dwarven material after all).

Two new cloth pieces: Cannibal's Hat and Cannibal's Tunic. They are made under dwarven like the weapons but cannot be tempered.

One ring: Ring of NOM NOM NOM allows you to FEAST upon your victims. Eat up, that corpse isn't going to eat itself.

[img=http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/607/9f01.png][/img]

Hahaha I love this mod, even if it's possibly the dumbest one on steam. ENJOY!
author: Owlburgers
